meanings.definition: (slang, rare) A person who is considered to be annoying or irritating.
meanings.english_definition: (slang, rare) A person who is considered to be annoying or irritating.

examples.translation: そんなにイライラさせるな！

usage_notes.explanation: This word is very rare and might not be widely understood.

readability_explanation.text: This is a very rare slang word. It is unlikely to be encountered in general use.
